comment:
Drammers Club online pour. 1/3 25 year glen scotias tried along smws 93.78 like a vintage dessert wine and ob glen scotia 25. 2nd favorite of the 25s just behind SMWS 93.78 “Like A Vintage Dessert Wine”. Doesn’t have much of the glen scotia maritime flavors. 


Nose: Raisins, Chocolate, Toffee, Cherries, Rasberries, Strawberries, Dates, Prunes, Cinnamon, Pepper, Blackberries, Cookie Dough, Burnt Pineapples, Blueberries

Palate: Strawberries, Cherry Starburst; Chocolate, Citrus, Toffee, Figs, Dates, Prunes, Smoke, Salted Caramel

Finish: Blackberries, Cherries, Chocolate, Cinnamon, Pepper, Toffee, Blueberries, Strawberries
